messages.title: THIS IS OUR CHANCE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: The only way to send a message to the Conservatives that they are taking the country in the wrong direction is to back Henrietta Bewley and the Lib Dems in Plymouth Sutton and Devonport.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Put a penny in the pound on Income Tax to give the NHS and social care services the cash injection they need. Transform mental health care with waiting time standards. Introduce a health and social care hospital; better integration of health and home and limit the amount elderly people pay for social care.

Invest nearly £7 billion extra in our children’s education. Increase school budgets and the Pupil Premium. Protect against rising costs and pupil numbers. Introduce a fairer national funding formula. Investing in high-quality early years education, tripling the Early Years Pupil Premium to £1,000. Opposing the Tory plan to end free school lunches for infants, introduced by Lib Dems.
Supports Paddy Ashdown’s bid to save the Royal Marines in which he served.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Lib Dems are gaining seats from Labour, UKIP and the Conservatives in the constituency.

issues.brexitEurope: The Conservative Party is pulling Britain out of the single market and putting jobs at risk. The Tories are dragging us out of the Single Market.
issues.education: Only Tim Farron's Liberal Democrats are speaking up for everyone in Plymouth who wants to stop a hard Brexit that can to further harm our schools and NHS.
issues.health: As your MP to save our NHS...

contactInformation.address: Printed by PS Ltd, PL5 1, K. Hoare, Northwest Hlds HQ, Plympton, Plymouth

leaflet.additionalNotes: A vote for Henrietta is a vote to Change Britain's Future. The reverse of the leaflet includes references to Brexit stating positions from other party leaders and arguing for change.
